data.title: Methane Hydrates and Contemporary Climate Change
meta_keywords: Methane Hydrates and Contemporary Climate Change
data.meta_description: Climate-sensitive methane hydrates are a tiny fraction of global deposits and should not contribute measurably to atmospheric methane increases in the 21st century.
